This O
module O
exploits O
a O
vulnerability O
in O
Adobe B-vendor
Flash B-application
Player I-application
versions O
10.2.152.33 B-version
and I-version
earlier I-version
. O
This O
issue O
is O
caused O
by O
a O
failure O
in O
the O
ActionScript3 O
AVM2 O
verification O
logic O
. O
This O
results O
in O
unsafe O
JIT(Just-In-Time O
) O
code B-relevant_term
being O
executed O
. O
This O
is O
the O
same O
vulnerability O
that O
was O
used O
for O
the O
RSA O
attack B-relevant_term
in O
March O
2011 O
. O
Specifically O
, O
this O
issue O
results O
in O
uninitialized O
memory B-relevant_term
being O
referenced O
and O
later O
executed O
. O
Taking O
advantage O
of O
this O
issue O
relies O
on O
heap O
spraying O
and O
controlling O
the O
uninitialized O
memory B-relevant_term
. O
Currently O
this O
exploit O
works O
for O
IE6 O
, O
IE7 O
, O
and O

Access B-relevant_term
Security O
( O
CAS O
) O
restrictions O
and O

data O
that O
is O
stored O
in O
unmanaged O
memory B-relevant_term
locations O
. O

sensitive B-relevant_term

accessible O
. O

scenario O
